intro: The trial, once begun, cannot be stopped. Are you ready to step into the eternal night?
description:
"Vigil: The Longest Night" is a side-scrolling action game. Take on the role of Vigilant Leila as she embarks on her trial—defending the town, exploring the world, battling sinister creatures, and uncovering the secrets of Shimmer’s Faith and its hidden schemes.

Master a Variety of Weapons
Find and wield different weapons with unique combat style. Upgrade your equipment through enchantments and forging to strengthen your abilities.

Explore a World Full of Secrets
Venture through diverse environments and dungeons, uncovering hidden paths, rare items, and forgotten lore.

Challenge the Night’s Terrors
Face over a hundred unique enemies and nearly 20 powerful bosses, testing your skill and determination in intense battles.
